title: [Firefly Villa, Approach]
description: Crushed shells follow a curving path as it winds its way through the foliage, their mother-of-pearl underbellies sparkling in the sunlight.  A series of low wooden steps leads to the inn's porch, which is draped in trailing exotic vines laden with brightly hued flowers that sway slightly in the seaborne breeze.
